page.title: 09INDUSTRY EMPLOYMENT
page.content: The Timber Merchant John N. Jack Ltd bought over the business as a going concern 25 years ago. Since then he has seen a steady decline in business. He now employes 12 full time workers with two vehicles for local delivery, long hauls are given to the local Haulage Contracters J.B. Nelson. Mr Jack used to travel throughout Scotland cutting his own trees, this became uneconomical ten years ago. He now deals in Softwood Conifers delivered to him from all over Scotland. He recently received a delivery from Balmoral, The Queens Estate. He saws the trees into Battens, Floor Joists, Planks etc. He also makes and sells Fencing, Huts, Sheds etc. Over 70% of his market went to England in the last few months.
